column4: Is there any way to actually run TV out on an ATI card w/o fglrx?  Or should I just by an nVidia card and be done with it?
as far as the fglrx drivers go, they work alright, why would you not want to use them?
I'm on a 9200.  And they don't work too well in that case.
Not to mention the fglrx drivers are so bad that Xorg on a 9200 goes 15x faster than fglrx on a 9800.
correction, the statistic was that a 7500 goes 15x faster than an X1400.  Which is even worse.
Hopefully this should explain my lack of support for fglrx.
